A Full Week to Explore the Future of Work

Curious what the future of work looks like? Probably a lot like coworking.

Try all of the participating Coworking Spaces for free

During the week of September 17 – 21, Berlin’s Coworking Spaces will open their doors for Coworking Festival – a unique chance to explore modern work spaces and collaboration.
